languages.text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} с помощью Неистовства Лилэтан, цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплена{/g} до конца боя. После первой за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} атаки этим оружием против ослепленной цели не требуется {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}период восстановления{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the wielder deals damage to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes blinded until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a round against the blinded target does not set the attack on cooldown.

When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

После первой за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} атаки этим оружием против ослепленной цели не требуется {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}период восстановления{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж наносит урон с помощью Неистовства Лилэтан, цель оказывается ослеплена до конца боя. После первой за раунд атаки этим оружием против ослепленной цели не требуется период восстановления.

Когда персонаж наносит урон с помощью Неистовства Лилэтан, цель оказывается ослеплена до конца боя. После первой за раунд атаки этим оружием против ослепленной цели не требуется период восстановления.

languages.text: 当装备者用莉莱赞之怒对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，使用莉莱赞之怒首次攻击致盲目标时，此次攻击不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者用莉莱赞之怒对目标造成伤害时，目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，使用莉莱赞之怒首次攻击致盲目标时，此次攻击不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。

languages.text: 使い手がリラエタンの怒りを使用してターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えると、ターゲットは戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。盲目状態のターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}でのリラエタンの怒りを使用した最初の攻撃は、攻撃に{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}が適用されない。
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: リラエタンの怒りを使用してターゲットにダメージを与えると、ターゲットは戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。盲目状態のターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}でのリラエタンの怒りを使用した最初の攻撃には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}が適用されない。

languages.text: Si el portador causa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al objetivo con Furia de Lilaethan, el enemigo quedará {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} hasta el final del combate. El primer ataque con Furia de Lilaethan en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} contra el objetivo cegado no activa el tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} del ataque.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador causa daño al objetivo con Furia de Lilaethan, el enemigo quedará {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} hasta el final del combate. El primer ataque con Furia de Lilaethan en una {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g} contra el objetivo cegado no activa el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} del ataque.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger der Waffe dem Ziel mit Lileaths Zorn {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, wird das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}. Der erste Angriff mit Lileaths Zorn in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} geben ein geblendetes Ziel setzt den Angriff nicht auf {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Waffenführer dem Ziel mit Lilaethans Zorn Schaden zufügt, wird das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}. Der erste Angriff mit Lilaethans Zorn in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} geben ein geblendetes Ziel setzt den Angriff nicht auf {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à la cible avec Fureur de Lilaethan, celle-ci subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} ne s'applique à la première attaque lancée avec Fureur de Lilaethan contre la cible aveuglée lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à la cible avec Fureur de Lilaethan, celle-ci subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} ne s'applique à la première attaque lancée avec Fureur de Lilaethan contre la cible aveuglée lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, Lilaethan'ın Öfkesi ile hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde hedef {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Lilaethan'ın Öfkesi ile bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde körleşen hedefe yapılan ilk saldırı, saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresine{/g} sokmaz.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
